title: Queue Schedule (updated)
body:
Hey everyone,

We're now at a point where we can expand Ranked Summoner's Rift. The next step for this will be opening the queue up to 24 hours on a trial basis. It's important to remember that this is a trial and is not a guarantee it will always remain this way.

**On all the time:**

Summoner's Rift 5v5 Normal Blind Pick
Summoner's Rift 5v5 Ranked Draft Pick
ARAM
Co-op vs AI Summoner's Rift (intro/beginner/intermediate)

**Twisted Treeline:**

Thursday: 3:00pm - 1:00am AEDT

Friday: 3:00pm - 1:00am AEDT

Saturday: 3:00pm - 1:00am AEDT

If you have any questions about any of this please post them below!

replies.body: DID YOU SERIOUSLY TAKE THIS AWAY???? YOU DON'T UNDERSTAND HOW HAPPY IT MADE PEOPLE. YOU DIDN'T TRY IT FOR LONG ENOUGH, MOST PEOPLE DIDN'T EVEN KNOW! PLEASE PUT IT BACK UP AND KEEP IT LIKE HONESTLY WE CAN'T PLAY RANKED ON ANY OTHER SERVER AND IT DOESN'T HELP MATCHMAKING AT ALL! NOT ONE PLAYER THAT ACTUALLY PLAYS RANKED LIKES THE FACT IN ANY WAY THAT THE QUEUE GOES DOWN! PLEAAAASE RIOT I JUST WENT TO REQUEUE AND I WAS SOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO SAD. YOU DON'T UNDERSTAND HOW MUCH WE LOVED IT, THE ONLY REASON YOU DIDN'T KNOW IS BECAUSE IT'S HARD AND TAKES EFFORT TO GET OUR WORD ACROSS IN THIS GAME IF WE'RE NOT A BIG REGION LIKE NA! PLEAAAAAAAAASE GIVE IT BACK LIKE HONESTLY I NEVER USE CAPS IT'S DRAINING ME THAT RANKED IS DOWN AGAIN. Some people live different lifestyles riot, not all of us can play during the day but are still big on league and ranked.... I'm honestly on my knees here pls. {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

Hey dude,

Nothing has changed. Ranked Solo/Duo is still 24 hours right now.

Ranked coming down at 4:00AM AEST last night was because of the patch:

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/ZpNdMY8H-complete-scheduled-maintenance-patch-519-30092015
Literally laughing right now xD
The new way is to tldr everything and just have a guess of what the thread is about
The calm AFTER the storm
http://media.lolusercontent.com/api/embedly/1/image/resize?url=http%3A%2F%2Fi62.tinypic.com%2F2lnvndf_th.jpg&key=a45e967db0914c7fb472fd4381e6c85b&width=150 I had to que dodge...

> [{quoted}](name=AlliehZorfvant,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ZzQR1haM,comment-id=001100000001,timestamp=2015-10-25T20:20:18.627+0000)
>
> I *wanted* to que dodge...

Fixed.
fixed what please? yeah it's better I que dodge and lose a bit rather than lose 15-20+ because of somebody purposely feeding! http://oi61.tinypic.com/2sagzs4.jpg
Is there a chance of getting Normal Draft at any point in the near future?

It's something that comes up every evaluation meeting. We're not in a place right now where we can open Normal Draft up, but we regularly check to see if we can. If that changes we'll announce it here.
So why does TB remain open then?

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ZzQR1haM,comment-id=000600000000,timestamp=2015-09-23T05:07:09.924+0000)
>
> So why does TB remain open then?

my guess is because it's a unique que.

Please highly consider this. 
It allows me to get the role I want and practice it constantly  getting ready for ranked without destroying my mmr

For example.  I currently main support in ranked but want to main mid so o can help snowball and carry.  I rarely get it in blind pick so im forced to support in ranked as it is all im good at
I used to use team builder bit that is gone too
No love for oce

Even bring it at set dayr to begin with.  Im sure it will do well
Permanent Ranked Queue <3

Im curious on why NA has Normal Draft mode and we don't. I really wish we had it so players (very much included myself) could avoid having to deal with the whole drama in champ select like instalockers and such. random picks im cool with but having your role taken after calling it and/or locking in. to many times do you have to dodge pr just forfeit a game because of trolls locking in jg or top lane or adc or something along with you. Are we ever going to get a normal draft?

We're currently in the 3rd season with the OCE server and yet we still have limited queues... How have we not even had 3v3 Ranked tested yet and with Dominion being taken of the table and we get an update on this or are we going to be ignored like we have for the past 3 years
Just wondering when oce will get the new normal and ranked draft queues? And will it replace blind pick? Thank you for your time.
I hope they remove normal blind pick and replace it with the same system as the new ranked draft. Make normal games so much better.

> [{quoted}](name=Lalna,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ZzQR1haM,comment-id=00190000,timestamp=2016-02-15T06:49:46.010+0000)
>
> I hope they remove normal blind pick and replace it with the same system as the new ranked draft. Make normal games so much better.

I believe that is their exact plan.
Will draft normals ever come back? I liked them the best. Not like a normal where I would pick sona into blitz and I don't enjoy ranked.
Please make Twisted Treeline Permenant :( PLEASE ! Xo love you
With Twisted treeline being open for 48 hours did this give any insight to opening up the queue longer?

We regularly evaluate whether we can have it, as we do for all of our queues. This means evaluating having queues on a limited basis, permanent basis, etc.

I hear you that it would be cool to have it, I know I would be all over it, but it's just about what the numbers make sense to do.

If we grow to the point of being able to have Ranked TT open, boards will be the first place the news will be posted.
Pretty sure people would play TT ranked over normal TT.
please bring in Twisted Treeline ranked 3v3 and teams please!!!

Just wondering if there are any plans to extend TT days or even open dominion or something for a while once the ranked season finishes? Would be nice to play  some different games since a lot of people have just done an end of season grind on SR. Should have a lot more numbers with no ranked queue.
Why don't you open TT forever?

We're not in a place where we can have the queue open permanently. It's in a good place for where it is right now, but it hasn't grown to the point of expansion yet.

It is something we evaluate every time and we will continue to do so.

Hi Sephyre, 

I'd just like to say, collecting data and evaluating it the way you do isn't great.
I've been playing LoL for along time now, co-existing with work, I have never been home at a time when TT is even AVAILABLE for me to play...

I think you should trial 24/7 all queues for a month or so in the new season, from there, determine which are the favourite and open them.

Idk.
Curious what the numbers that you guys over at Riot are hoping for before you open up 3v3 twisted treeline permanently.

> [{quoted}](name=Sephyre,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ZzQR1haM,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-09-23T01:18:52.526+0000)
>
> Everyday - 8:00am AEDT - 4:00am (next day) AEST

Love how you do it in 2 different timezones ;)
Good point! Fixed!

Hey Sephyre,

Do you think there will be any chance of ranked 3v3 TT in the near future? even if it's only part time like the queue is now? Even just to know that you guys are considering or have talked about this would be great news.

Cheers.

THANK YOU! I was waiting to see if you guys would act on the mishap that showed rankled queues 24/7 had demand and enough players to keep the queue times acceptable.

 Glad this finally happened even if you label it a trial for now. 

 This is especially helpful atm with the seasons end coming up.

Yes yes yes! Please leave it like this. I've wanted this for so long because some nights im up until 5-6am and other times I wake up at 5am-6am and want to play a game before leaving home. I'm sure OCE is big enough now to have fairly decent queue times for most people at these hours.
Is this effective immediately?
Yep, Solo/Duo Ranked is 24/7 as of now.

Thought I saw ranked ARAM, didn't see ranked ARAM
Rest In Pepperonis my heart{{item:3070}}{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
Can you drop the worst queue of Team Builder and replace it for 3v3s normal or ranked.
Is there any chance we will be getting 3's enabled permanently or ranked 3's at all? It's pretty much the only mode I play and as a result I only play Thursday-Sunday these days =(

Heres an idea about queue? Why not fix them with your annual billion dollar turnovers. People with high hidden ratings atm are on average waiting 25 minutes for a game. Worst yet if your unlucky someone que jumps and your yet again on a 20 minute que.
I totally agree my queues have been over 30 minutes Ranked queues it's so shocking atm
Please make twisted tree line a constant map i only have 2 other friends ;e;
When will Team Builder come back?
